Rumble still blinked trying to regain his focus, when Groove's foot
smashed into his chest hard, causing the metal in Rumble's chest plate
to buckle, as he screamed out. He stopped trying to focus his eyes, as
his arms transformed into his trademark Piledrivers, and he blindly
swung out at the direction the foot came from.

Soundwave narrowly rolled out of the way of the rocket, but not the
explosion, as the shock sent Soundwave flying like a rag doll as his
body bounced off the ground several feet away.
 
Spasstik's forward assault was cut short by the attack on him, as the
force of the blasts also sent him slidding away, grinding against the
ground. He stopped near Soundwave, and nudged the comunicator's arm,
trying to get a response, as Soundwave slowly began to try and push
himself into an upright position.
